amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Commissioner decision; person aggrieved; right to hearing and review.
amendatorysection.para: Any person aggrieved by a decision of the commissioner respecting denial of an authorization to operate or of an agent's permit or the placing of conditions on either shall have the right to a hearing and review of such decision by the board as provided in sections 85-1630 to 85-1632.
